about_the_game:
In PowerWash Adventure Demo, you can literally get your hands on the exhilarating feeling of rinsing and relieving pressure. The operation of the game is super simple: use the high-pressure water gun to flush items to clean. As a casual and stress relieving rinsing simulation game, you can start and end it at any time without gameplay pressure. We also offer a variety of immersive themes: weightless space, cleaning workshop, and a variety of animals on the prairie!

Offers a variety of scenarios and characters
You're a city cleaner protecting the the environment, you're an astronaut in space rinsing a space station, or you can be the archaeologist rinsing a statue of Anubis in the Sahara Desert. Richly themed levels and expansion DLCs allow you to experience the multiverse, with even more intimate interactions with the pretty girls for you to unlock!

No pressure, just flush!
The game's interactive mechanism is as simple as picking up a high-pressure water gun and rinsing the items in the scene to make them clean. Players can configure different nozzles for the water gun to feel the different spraying feeling and enjoy the immersive rinsing process. You can start and finish the game at any time, so you won't feel the game stress. We also provide a handy little helper to help you easily find hidden stains and unlock 100% of the rinsing progress, so say goodbye to compulsive disorder!
